## showMessageBox() function

Shows a message box

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function showMessageBox(win: NWJS_Helpers.win | Window, options: MessageBoxOptions): Promise<MessageBoxReturnValue>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  win | NWJS\_Helpers.win \| Window | If <code>title</code> option is omitted, it will be the win's title. |
|  options | [MessageBoxOptions](./nwjs-dialog.messageboxoptions.md) | Message box options |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[MessageBoxReturnValue](./nwjs-dialog.messageboxreturnvalue.md)<!-- -->&gt;

Resolves with a promise.

## Remarks

If the `win` argument is omitted, it will be the current window.

## Example


```js
const { showMessageBox } = require("nwjs-dialog");
showMessageBox(nw.Window.get(), {
  message: "Message",
}).then(({ button }) => {
  console.log(button);
});
```
